author: nzola8
title: Cardano/Lokole Network integration
description: Nearly about 40% of the world population is not connected to internet. Very difficult for this population to access Cardano system.
solution: We have built an off/online portable web and email network called "Lokole" to help connect the unconnected.
experience: Group of Open Source developers, software engineers, coders and electronic technicians.Using Python, Microsoft Azure, Flask, GitHub, RPI.
